name: Deadrun II
description:
Equip yourself and descend.

Controls
  • WASD: move
  • Mouse: look around
  • F: fullscreen
  • Mouse1: attack
  • 1, 2: change weapon
Info

This is a sequel to my LD44 entry. It builds on the same from-scratch engine.

Browser Support

Tested in:

  • Chrome 77.0.3865.90
  • Firefox 69.0.2
